name: ASL Translator
tagline: A program that automatically downloads and concatenates videos from various ASL video dictionaries
body:
# Overview
ASL Translator is a program to easily generate practice videos from various ASL video dictionaries.

# Downloading
It is necessary to download two files to use the program:
* [First file](https://github.com/matthewlw/ASLTranslator/blob/master/bin/Debug/ASLSitesClient.exe?raw=true)
* [Second file](https://github.com/matthewlw/ASLTranslator/blob/master/bin/Debug/CsQuery.dll?raw=true)

# Using
Watch [this demo](https://asciinema.org/a/d1k8gl2gazmdtbiqyo8cs9qwp) to see how to use the program.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
